product_name: The North Face Alpine Project Hybrid Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Alpine Project Hybrid jacket for men blends tough weather resistance with a soft shell's versatility. Don't be surprised if you find yourself looking for any excuse to stay outside. Gore Windstopper(R) material completely blocks wind and sheds water for total weather resistance without being stiff or restrictive. Breathable stretch nylon panels on sides and upper back provide comfort for a wide range of conditions or when working hard. 2 zippered front pockets sit high on the torso for harness and pack compatibility. Hidden hem cinch-cord seals in warmth. The North Face Alpine Project Hybrid jacket is part of The North Face Summit Series(TM), designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: The North Face Alpine Project Hybrid jacket for men blends tough weather resistance with a soft shell's versatility. Don't be surprised if you find yourself looking for any excuse to stay outside.
